sources.title: The Underwater City
sources.description: Title: The Underwater City Summary: An engineer, a psychologist and several other disparate types take part in an experiment to see if people can live for extended periods of time in a city built under the ocean. Directed by: Frank McDonald Actors: William Lundigan, Julie Adams, Roy Roberts Production Company: Neptune Productions Release Date: 19 April 1962 (Mexico) Aspect Ratio: REMOVE_TAG An engineer, a psychologist and several other disparate types take part in an experiment to see if people can live for extended periods of time in a city built under the ocean.

metadata.Plot: An engineer, a psychologist and several other disparate types take part in an experiment to see if people can live for extended periods of time in a city built under the ocean.
metadata.Writer: Alex Gordon, Ruth Alexander, Orville H. Hampton
